query:
UPDATE smtp_credentials cred
            SET description = $1
            FROM streams s 
                JOIN projects p ON s.project_id = p.id
            WHERE cred.id = $2
              AND cred.stream_id = s.id 
              AND cred.stream_id = $3
              AND s.project_id = $4
              AND p.organization_id = $5
            RETURNING 
                cred.id,
                cred.description,
                cred.username
